textBeforeTable: Scientific classification Aonyx From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Aonyx
textAfterTable: Species Aonyx capensis Aonyx cinerea Aonyx is a genus of otters, containing two species, the African Clawless Otter and the Oriental Small-clawed Otter. Wikispecies has information related to: Aonyx v  •  d  •  e Extant species of family Mustelidae Kingdom: Animalia · Phylum: Chordata · Class: Mammalia · Order: Carnivora · Suborder: Caniformia Lutrinae Aonyx
